overview: Becca Bradley is desperate to land the lead in a new crime drama, but none of the casting agents will take her seriously. For some insight, she agrees to go for a ride along with a police officer. Before she knows it, Becca finds herself not only caught up in a real case, but falling for Officer James. Will she land the part AND the guy, or will Becca just end up... Along for the Ride?
tagline: She's Ready For Some "Hands On" Training.
title: Along for the Ride
